backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Aggregated feature-evidence report linking feature IDs to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries for numerous frontend files describing layout, pages, components, and styling.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind and CSS variable definitions implementing the black/gold theme with light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file setting metadata, SEO tags, fonts, and mounting the web app root.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Allows all crawlers and points to the public sitemap URL.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: XML sitemap listing main site routes with change frequency and priority info.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the TanStack Router and wraps the app in a dark-theme provider.
frontend/src/components/contact/ContactF: Client-side validated contact form that opens WhatsApp with a prefilled message and resets after submission.
frontend/src/components/contact/RequestA: Form for submitting change requests that sends the details via WhatsApp based on selected site area.
frontend/src/components/gallery/Lightbox: Modal lightbox component that shows images with captions and supports keyboard and button navigation.
frontend/src/components/layout/FloatingA: Floating WhatsApp and call action buttons with tooltips fixed to the bottom-right of the screen.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer displaying brand info, contact details, proprietor info, and copyright notice.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Responsive header with logo and navigation links, including a mobile menu using a sheet drawer.
frontend/src/components/layout/Layout.ts: App layout wrapper combining header, footer, floating actions, and routed page content.
frontend/src/components/Section.tsx: Reusable section wrapper component with optional background pattern support.
frontend/src/components/seo/Seo.tsx: SEO helper that updates document title and meta tags including Open Graph fields.
frontend/src/content/galleryItems.ts: Static list of gallery image items containing image paths and captions.
frontend/src/content/siteContent.ts: Structured site content including hero text, highlights, testimonials, and about information.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refetching queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, exposing identity, login, logout, and status helpers.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind-based styles, CSS variables, typography, dark mode settings, and utility classes for gold-themed UI elements.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and the InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with SEO metadata, company story, values, and services using styled sections and content arrays.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Implements the Contact page with SEO, a contact form, contact details, and scroll-to-anchor behavior.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Displays a gallery grid from galleryItems and shows a lightbox when an image is selected.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Builds the homepage with a hero section, service highlights, calls to action, and content sourced from siteContent and galleryItems.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: React page that renders the Services screen with SEO tags, a hero section, mapped service cards with benefits, and a WhatsApp CTA.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, typography, animations, and theme settings, with plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: JSON file describing the project's state, design requirements, features, branding notes, and architectural guidance for the website.
